text: The 2015 Toronto FC II season was the first season in the club's history. ==Roster== ===Players=== As of end of season. The squad of Toronto FC II will be composed of an unrestricted number of first-team players on loan to the reserve team, players signed to TFC II, and TFC Academy players. Academy players who appear in matches with TFC II will retain their college eligibility. {| class="wikitable sortable" |+USL contracted players |- ! style="background:#c80815; color:#fff;" scope="col"|No. ! style="background:#c80815;
